subject: [R] how to input data from the keyboard
body:
Hello everybody, i wish to input data from the keyboard. In C++ it would seem
like this:

printf("Input parameter Alpha= ");
scanf("%d", α);

how would be in R?

Thanks for your help.

Bye 
Miguel.
--
